title: Drawing, "Harold S. Anderson House; Domestics' Rooms/ Plans, Furniture Layout", 1937
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, double ruled border in graphite
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower center: DOMESTICS ROOMS/SCALE 1/4" - 1'0"/SHOWING ARRANGEMENT/OF FURNITURE; lower right in graphite: See revised plan./Wood Service Plates; notes, labels, and numbers in graphite
description: Floor plans and furniture layout for domestics' rooms. Two maid's rooms at upper center with beds, dressers, closets, and other furniture. Larger room below with day bed (by other), upholstered chair, table, dresser and other furniture.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Harold S. Anderson House; Domestics' Rooms/ Plans, Furniture Layout", 1937.
1937. Graphite on tracing paper, double ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-626.
